comment: Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite
inlinecomment: ' Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite

arguments.label: outputLoc
arguments.comment: Directory to write the HTML or XML report to
arguments.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Directory to write the HTML or XML report to</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
arguments.commenthtml: Directory to write the HTML or XML report to
arguments.inlinecomment: ' Directory to write the HTML or XML report to

methods.label: printoutReport
methods.comment: Write out the actual HTML report
methods.codesample:
Sub completeReport()
    
    Dim testSuite as New TestSuiteReport(Me.outputLoc)
    Call testSuite.printoutReport(Me)
    
End Sub
